subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It has been a delicate balance for the Brewers, distancing themselves from the actions of Ryan Braun while employing him, but that is Mark Attanasio’s challenge.
snippet: It has been a delicate balance for the Brewers, distancing themselves from the actions of Ryan Braun while employing him, but that is Mark Attanasio’s challenge.
